summary_points: 1. On July 25, 2025, Zebra Technologies Corporation expanded its Board of Directors from ten to eleven members and appointed Mary McDowell as a Class I director, effective immediately.

2. Ms. McDowell's compensation will be consistent with the company's standard arrangements for non-employee directors, as described in the March 28, 2025 proxy statement, and will be prorated for her starting date.
3.  Ms. McDowell's term expires at Zebra's 2027 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, at which time she will stand for re-election.
1. Revvity, Inc. reported second-quarter 2025 revenue of $720 million, a 4% reported increase and 3% organic growth year-over-year.
2.  Adjusted EPS from continuing operations decreased to $1.18 in Q2 2025 from $1.22 in Q2 2024.
3.  Full-year 2025 revenue guidance was raised to $2.84-$2.88 billion, reflecting changes in foreign currency exchange rates and assuming 2% to 4% organic growth.
